actions.name: Schooling
actions.description: Effect: While the user meets the [Intrepid 1/3] Condition and is at least Level 25, the user is in its School Forme, changing Formes as a Free Action. Otherwise, they are in Solo Forme. While in Solo Forme, the user possesses +2 default EVA.
